reviews.review: Huge let down.  Was super excited to see the movie only to feel that it was drug out, slow at times, and very unepic fight scenes.  Not the best avengers movie by far.
Probably the best super hero movie yet. A1 in this bitch. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON 3D THOUGH. ITS BETTER IN 2D
maybe the best superhero movie ever made.

Thanos has been attempting to acquire the six Infinity Stones in order to wipe out half the population of the universe. The reason for this is that on his home planet Titan he long ago suggested that the solution to their overpopulation problems and lack of resources was to randomly kill every other person in his civilisation.

Understandably, the people of Titan weren't entirely down with this plan. They ignored him, and later on the impending doom came and the planet was left a wasteland. From that day on, Thanos knew that the only thing to do was to kill half of every populated planet in existence.

What the hell, Thanos?

 The idea that these people (or anyone) would thank him for using the stones to kill half of them is utter bull.

#BadStoryline #OverpopulationFactor #AvengersInfintyWarSucks #Rushed
one of the best marvel movies out there, didnt feel as long as it was and left me wanting more. I would be lying if it didnt make me tear up but I cant wait for avengers 4!

Avengers Infinity War is a very big, beautiful ambitious movie and everything put in the movie is probably as good as it gets. The real problem is just how the first half paces this very contained structure of storytelling. There's no sense of building the film. It's more of just a sequence followed by a sequence followed by a sequence. Once the second half begins, or around the third act, the movie becomes a more focused building of story and events that culminates into a brutally epic finale and a shocking ending that closes the story but leaves room for the sequel/finale in 2019.
Well worth the wait.  Very well done.
Best marvel movie of all time go watch
Absolutely fantastic (part 1) closeout for phase 3 of the MCU. Knocked me on my ass and left me there. Bring on part 2
I CANT. WHY. WHY DO YOU DO THIS TO ME. OMG. WORTH THE $$$. Worth the wait. Worth everything. GO SEE!!
